channel.title: AllstarScape VS DeltaScape
channel.description:
I have an Allstar server that I feel is quite creative and fun to play...but I don't feel it's the best quality type of server.
What I would like to know is what are the pros and cons of AllstarScape-based and DeltaScape-based servers. I have an idea of the differences, but I would like to understand the coding styles and files a little better.
Thank you,
TheCyberMan
P.S. Can Ubuntu Linux host both of these fine?
